name: Baby Ball Toss Basketball Game for Kids
name_original: Baby Ball Toss Basketball Game for Kids
description:
Help our young basketball enthusiast fulfill his dream of becoming world’s greatest shooter!

Help him in shooting the balls by flicking the ball into the ring!

You can shoot slowly but surely, or you can shoot rapidly.
No matter what your style is as long as you get it into the rim and score!

Shoot as many balls as you can before time runs out!

FEATURES++
-Smooth controls
-Leadeboard (try and beat your personal best!)
-Great game for kids!
